declare @cliernterPoint geography ; select @cliernterPoint=geography::Point(#{latitude},#{longitude},4326) ; select b.Id as BusinessId, min(b.Name) as BusinessName,min(b.address) as BusinessAddress ,round(geography::Point(ISNULL(b.Latitude,0),ISNULL(b.Longitude,0),4326).STDistance(@cliernterPoint),0) as DistanceToBusiness, count(tm.businessId) WaitingCounts, b.Longitude businessLongitude,b.Latitude businessLatitude,min(b.City) businessCityName from BusinessClienterRelation a (nolock) join dbo.business b (nolock) on a.BusinessId = b.Id and a.ClienterId=#{clienterId,jdbcType=INTEGER} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oc.BusinessId FROM dbo.[order] o ( NOLOCK ) JOIN OrderChild oc ( NOLOCK ) ON oc.OrderId = o.Id AND o.Platform = 2 AND oc.Status = 0 JOIN BusinessClienterRelation kb ( NOLOCK ) ON oc.businessId = kb.BusinessId AND kb.ClienterId = #{clienterId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) tm ON tm.businessId = b.id where a.IsEnable = 1 and a.IsBind = 1 and a.AuditStatus=1 group by b.Id,b.Latitude,b.Longitude order by count(tm.businessId) desc
